app.title: Resolve

head.title: Resolve
head._title.comment: Title of the app displayed in web title bar. {Placeholder = Resolve}

head._subTitle.comment: Default sub title of the app displayed in web title bar. {Placeholder = Community Health Resilience Tool}

mainNavigation._tagsText.comment: Top navigation item for Tags page
mainNavigation._reportingText.comment: Top navigation item for Reporting page
mainNavigation.offline: You are working offline. Some functionality is not available.

_personaTitle.comment: Hello string to greet logged-in user. {Placeholder = [,firstName,]}

personaMenu._accountText.comment: Persona menu navigation item for Account page
personaMenu._logoutText.comment: Persona menu navigation item for Logout user action
personaMenu._takePhoto.comment: Persona menu navigation item for take photo user action

mobileMenu._homePageLabel.comment: Label to home page in mobile nav
mobileMenu._servicesLabel.comment: Label to services page in mobile nav
mobileMenu._specialistPageLabel.comment: Label to specialsits page in mobile nav
mobileMenu._clientsPageLabel.comment: Label to clients page in mobile nav
mobileMenu._tagsPageLabel.comment: Label to tags page in mobile nav
mobileMenu._reportingPageLabel.comment: Label to reporting page in mobile nav

_notificationRowText.comment: Notification row content message for mention with sender and description of the request. Do not translate [[sender]], [[description]]. {Placeholder=[,]}
notificationRowDefaultText: You were mentioned in a request. Click here to view.
_notificationRowDefaultText.comment: Default notification a user sees if they were mentioned in a request.
_notificationTitle.comment: Notification title displayed in the opening panel

notificationButtons._markAllAsReadText.comment: Button text for marking all notifications as read
notificationButtons._dismissAllText.comment: Button text for dismiss all notifications

_noNotificationText.comment: Text displayed in the notification panel when a user have no notifications

formElements._datePickerAriaLabel.comment: Default aria label for date picker components

languageDropdownAriaLabel: Language dropdown, use arrow keys if using tab navigation to select a language
_languageDropdownAriaLabel.comment: Aria label for language select dropdown in user settings

shortString._more.comment: Show more label for long text
shortString._less.comment: Show less label for long text

complianceWarning.title: Compliance Warning
complianceWarning.body: This app is currently in pilot test phase. Do NOT put any real client or sensitive in this app at this time.

errors.unauthenticated: The email address or password you entered is incorrect. Please try again.
errors.tokenExpired: Session Expired. Please log in again.

getTimeDuration._hours.comment: Abbreviated time duration unit for Hours
getTimeDuration._minutes.comment: Abbreviated time duration unit for Minutes
getTimeDuration._seconds.comment: Abbreviated time duration unit for Seconds

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.subtitle: The page you are trying to access is not found or available.

useAuth.resetFailed: Failed to send user reset password email

useEngagement._setStatusSuccess.comment: [[status]] to NOT be translated. Set request status success message.

useServicelist._deleteAnswerFailed.comment: Failed to delete service record message
useServicelist._updateAnswerFailed.comment: Failed to update service record message

tagCategory._SDOH.comment: Tag group pretaining to a clients social determinants of health
tagCategory._PROGRAM.comment: Tag group for programs that a community based organization are conducting
tagCategory._GRANT.comment: Tag group for grants that a community based organization have recieved or are trying to receieve funding for
tagCategory._OTHER.comment: Tag group for tags that do not fall into the other groups
tagCategory._ALL.comment: Used when referring to all tag groups

offline.generalNotice: You are currently offline. Any records created while offline will be stored on your device and sync automatically when you connect to the internet.
offline._generalNotice.comment: Used when the user is offline as a general notification
offline.entityCreationNotice: You are currently offline. This record will be stored on your device and sync automatically when you connect to the internet.
offline._entityCreationNotice.comment: Used when the user is offline and the form to create a record is open
offline._connectToTheInternet.comment: Message displayed to connect to the internet
offline.offlineNotice: You are offline. You can add data but must reconnect to see and search existing records.
offline._offlineNotice.comment: Message displayed when the user is offline
